resources.string: The most recent project I am working on currently is Classroom Application. It is an android application project based on Java. It uses almost every features like Rest APIs, SpringFrameWork, Databases. Apart from that I have worked on simple projects like Bus Management System using OOPs in C++ and OTT Management using Python. Some portfolios of my works are-
Classroom Android Application (Java)\nOTT Subscription Management (Python)\nBus Management System (C++)

Sandesh Pandey, a student at SRM University with a passion for Computer science and currently pursuing CSE. I am a Tech-Driven Trailblazer poised to script a narrative that will inspire generations to come. It is not just about books and codes â€“ I love cricket and online action games too. I thrive on building cool projects and writing code that makes things work.
